correct_option.title: Correct Option
correct_option.description: This consists only a letter of the correct option

foo: What is the primary goal of managing septic shock?
A) Administer high doses of vasopressors to increase blood pressure
B) Quickly restore circulating volume and perfusion of vital organs
C) Use antibiotics to target the underlying infection source
D) Administer corticosteroids to reduce inflammation
